channel.title: Korasi-pk need hoster and co-coder
channel.description:
Hello, I am looking for a host and co-coder for my server: Korasi-pk. It's a 528 with a 317 cache, so no new animations or items. It's a pking server, with bosses and npcs but it's mainly about pking
must have tv and dropbox!!!!
my msn: razoremo@hotmail.com ask for any update or pic (this is v1 only)
Feature's 100% Working Combat Corporal Beasts Working Godwars Working Skilling Working Donator Zone Edgeville Home Super Donator Extreme Donator Donator Chest [Made Lots of Paypal off this] +
- Has beast combat! - 317 server with 633 character models and 602 cache. - Server is based to Pking and skilling. - Specials work 100% - Dragon claws works 100% - Dragonfire shield works 100% with charging! - 100% Working pvp armours and items ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! - Corporal beast lair - Edge is home - Working spell timers / spells! - Tormented demon! - Thieving from stall for money if needed - Working special / health bar - Banking works. - Skillcape emotes. - ::Pure on begin! - Nice Dfs handler - Awesome donator benefits!
pic
